edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.util

Class Oscillator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.util.Oscillator

  • public class Oscillator
extends java.lang.Object
    Oscillator class that helps automate and handle oscillatory motion (usually for certain spellcards).
    Author:
    bowenzhi

        type - Type of oscillation
        omega - Used in BOUNDED_OMEGA

        period - Used in COSINE
